formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR in Parse[21] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: Parse[21] ((¯1⌽cm)/ns)←cm/ns ⍝ Shift all children down by one

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The use of / applies the filter along the wrong axis. Instead, the ⌿ filter should be used instead.
